lead_paragraph: Homeland Security has imposed tougher requirements for such licenses to be valid for federal purposes. And several states remain out of compliance.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Raising The Bar on ID For Air Travel
headline.main: New Rule Adding Wrinkle to Use of Driver’s Licenses as Flight ID

snippet: Homeland Security has imposed tougher requirements for such licenses to be valid for federal purposes. And several states remain out of compliance....
